entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 14 April 2023
